sourcesContent: function t(){return t=>t.addInitializer((t=>new e(t)))}class e{constructor(t){this.host=t,this.host.addController(this)}async hostConnected(){await this.host.updateComplete,this.host.addEventListener("keydown",(t=>this.emulateActive(t))),this.host.addEventListener("mousedown",(t=>this.emulateActive(t))),this.host.addEventListener("keyup",(()=>this.emulateInactive())),this.host.addEventListener("blur",(()=>this.emulateInactive())),this.host.addEventListener("mouseup",(()=>this.emulateInactive()))}emulateActive(t){this.host.disabled||this.host?.setAttribute("cds-active",""),"Space"===t.code&&t.target===this.host&&t.preventDefault()}emulateInactive(){this.host.removeAttribute("cds-active")}}export{e as ActiveController,t as active};
